Room.Name: Cave of the Deadly Sasquatch
Room.ShortDescription: You look uneasily around the dark, dank cave.
Room.LongDescription: Due to the humidity and absence of sunlight, strange forms of slimy moss are seen growing on rocky protrusions throughout the cave. The very dim source of light limits your vision, blinding you to the vast, shadowy expanses of the huge cave. However, you have the strangest suspicion that something is lurking nearby in the darkness.
